package.name: pioneer_teleop
package.description: The pioneer_teleop package provides teleoperation using keyboard, sockets or command line for the Adept MobileRobots Pioneer and Pioneer-compatible robots (Including Pioneer 2, Pioneer 3, Pioneer LX, AmigoBot, PeopleBot, PatrolBot, PowerBot, Seekur and Seekur Jr.).
package.author: Amine BENDAHMANE
